edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject

Class Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Record
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all of the player's records, including top records as well as accumulative records.
    Author:
    Natanael Ariawan, David Hau, Miguel Menjivar, Aidan Novobilski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int enemiesKilled
      This field records the highest number of enemies killed in any game mode in a single gameplay.
      private int highestLevelHard
      This field records the highest level reached in hard game mode in a single gameplay.
      private int highestLevelNormal
      This field records the highest level reached in normal game mode in a single gameplay.
      private int itemsObtained
      This field records the highest number of items obtained in any game mode in a single gameplay.
      private int livesRemaining
      This field records the highest remaining player lives in any game mode in a single gameplay.
      private int roomsChecked
      This field records the highest number of rooms checked in any game mode in a single gameplay.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      This field represents the unique ID used for saving and loading via serialization.
      private int totalEnemiesKilled
      This field records the accumulative number of enemies killed in any game mode.
      private int totalItemsObtained
      This field records the accumulative number of items obtained in any game mode.
      private int totalLevelHard
      This field records the accumulative number of levels cleared in hard game mode.
      private int totalLevelNormal
      This field records the accumulative number of levels cleared in normal game mode.
      private int totalRoomsChecked
      This field records the accumulative number of rooms checked in any game mode.
      private int turnsSurvived
      This field records the highest number of turns survived in any game mode in a single gameplay.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] getRecords()
      This method retrieves the value of every field in this class and compiles the data into an array of integers, which is then returned to be used in the GameEngine.
      void increaseTotalEnemiesKilled(int enemiesKilled)
      This method updates the field totalEnemiesKilled by increasing it by the amount of enemies killed during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode.

      This method updates the field totalItemsObtained by increasing it by the amount of items obtained during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode.

      This method updates the field totalLevelHard by increasing it by the amount of levels cleared during this specific gameplay if the player is playing in hard mode.
      void increaseTotalLevelNormal(int levelsCleared)
      This method updates the field totalLevelNormal by increasing it by the amount of levels cleared during this specific gameplay if the player is playing in normal mode.

      This method updates the field totalRoomsChecked by increasing it by the amount of rooms checked during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Record

        public Record()

    • Method Detail

      • getRecords

        public int[] getRecords()
        This method retrieves the value of every field in this class and compiles the data into an array of integers, which is then returned to be used in the GameEngine.
        Returns:
        an array of ints that represents the value of every field contained in this class

      • setHighestLevelNormal

        public void setHighestLevelNormal(int highestLevelNormal)
        This method sets the field highestLevelNormal using the given levels cleared passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        highestLevelNormal - the number of levels the player cleared in that specific gameplay

      • setHighestLevelHard

        public void setHighestLevelHard(int highestLevelHard)
        This method sets the field highestLevelHard using the given levels cleared passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        highestLevelHard - the number of levels the player cleared in that specific gameplay

      • setLivesRemaining

        public void setLivesRemaining(int livesRemaining)
        This method sets the field highestLevelHard using the given number of lives remaining passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        livesRemaining - the number of lives the player has remaining in that specific gameplay

      • setTurnsSurvived

        public void setTurnsSurvived(int turnsSurvived)
        This method sets the field turnsSurvived using the given number of turns survived passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        turnsSurvived - the number of turns the player survived in that specific gameplay

      • setRoomsChecked

        public void setRoomsChecked(int roomsChecked)
        This method sets the field roomsChecked using the given number of rooms checked passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        roomsChecked - the number of rooms the player checked in that specific gameplay

      • setItemsObtained

        public void setItemsObtained(int itemsObtained)
        This method sets the field itemsObtained using the given number of items obtained passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        itemsObtained - the number of items the player obtained in that specific gameplay

      • setEnemiesKilled

        public void setEnemiesKilled(int enemiesKilled)
        This method sets the field enemiesKilled using the given number of enemies killed passed as a parameter. This method will only be called if the parameter passed is higher than the current value of the field.
        Parameters:
        enemiesKilled - the number of enemies the player killed in that specific gameplay

      • increaseTotalLevelNormal

        public void increaseTotalLevelNormal(int levelsCleared)
        This method updates the field totalLevelNormal by increasing it by the amount of levels cleared during this specific gameplay if the player is playing in normal mode. This method will always be called after a normal mode game is completed.
        Parameters:
        levelsCleared - the number of normal levels cleared during this gameplay

      • increaseTotalLevelHard

        public void increaseTotalLevelHard(int levelsCleared)
        This method updates the field totalLevelHard by increasing it by the amount of levels cleared during this specific gameplay if the player is playing in hard mode. This method will always be called after a hard mode game is completed.
        Parameters:
        levelsCleared - the number of hard levels cleared during this gameplay

      • increaseTotalRoomsChecked

        public void increaseTotalRoomsChecked(int roomsChecked)
        This method updates the field totalRoomsChecked by increasing it by the amount of rooms checked during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode. This method will always be called after a game in any mode is completed.
        Parameters:
        roomsChecked - the number of rooms checked during this gameplay

      • increaseTotalItemsObtained

        public void increaseTotalItemsObtained(int itemsObtained)
        This method updates the field totalItemsObtained by increasing it by the amount of items obtained during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode. This method will always be called after a game in any mode is completed.
        Parameters:
        itemsObtained - the number of items obtained during this gameplay

      • increaseTotalEnemiesKilled

        public void increaseTotalEnemiesKilled(int enemiesKilled)
        This method updates the field totalEnemiesKilled by increasing it by the amount of enemies killed during this specific gameplay regardless of game mode. This method will always be called after a game in any mode is completed.
        Parameters:
        enemiesKilled - the number of enemies killed during this gameplay
